direction.raw_text: . CHRIST!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold 'em off.  I'm taking her down. He peers out at the incredible sight of the creatures ripping off the wing skin and tearing huge plates from the cowlings. The camera pans down to his feet as the hatch door handle twists and then bursts open.  A dozen bat-like creatures swarm in. The NAVIGATOR panics and reaches up, grabbing the flare gun from its rack.  He screams as the creatures attack and shoots right through the creatures, bathing the aircraft with a bright ruby glow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay you little bastards ... shit ... (screams)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (struggling) Jesus H. Christ!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it. Satisfied that this is the piece he had lost in the machine, he begins to re-solder it in place.  Behind him, a LITTLE GIRL with red hair comes into the room and walks up to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's broken again, isn't it Daddy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes dear.  But Daddy's fixing it.  (hums)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How come it's always breaking?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, sweetheart.  Mmmmhmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When it's fixed, will you make more funny pictures for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, why don't you go play with your toys and let Daddy finish his work, okay?  Mmmm ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. The LITTLE GIRL wanders around to the other side of the machine, as AUSTIN flips a switch.  Once again the glass sphere sparkles and the holographic screen lights up.  AUSTIN uses a tool to fine-tune the holograph and an image begins to materialize; the glass gates of Kraan. As the image becomes clearer, the camera pulls closer and closer to the holograph screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Behold!  The Sphere of Uluhtec! Look upon it, Taarna.  Look upon it with fear.  For in its glow lies the end of heaven - the beginning of hell.  Take it Taarna.  Feel death in your hands.  For death is upon you.  And as you perish ... so dies your race! The witch's eyes go green.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take it !! She hurls tha ball at TAARNA, who dodges it.  The ball sails past her, out the window.  Then TAARNA, sword raised, leaps at the WITCH, slicing through her in rapid strokes. The WITCH cackles and crumbles into dust, but her green eyes stay suspended in the air, and her cackle echoes through the room. TAARNA backs away, climbing out the window, onto her bird.  As she flies off, she sees the WITCH'S green ball high above her, rising into the clouds and disappearing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doctor Anrak, six more mutants were sighted in Arizona this morning.  Do you still say this has nothing to do with the green radiation from space. The driver walks on without speaking. T.V. NEWSMAN (walking alongside) Doctor, is it true that the President himself pulled you off the Jupiter Six Project so that you could investigate those mutations? Doctor, answer me that. He ignores the question, and walks past the guard into the Pentagon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... well what I wanna know is, what's the Army doing about this? Hell!  My constiuents are turning green!  They're growing arms on their backs.  There's something or someone up there in space and the voters have a right to know about it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Senator, we have no proof that these mutations are the result of interference from outer space.  In fact, Doctor Anrak has just come in, so let's hear what he has to say ... Doctor? The room goes silent as the DOCTOR stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First of all, there is no cause for alarm.  As for the theories of interference by alien beings, it is my firm opinion that we on Earth are the only intelligent, technically advanced civilization present in the universe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... and whatever is causing these mutations is not from outer space. it's more likely just an isolated biological pheno ... pheno ... ph ... ph ... ph ... Suddenly the DOCTOR'S head starts to jerk from side to side. Everyone looks on, not knowing how to react.  As the DOCTOR begins to move in short bursts, like a broken robot, he fixes his gaze upon the pretty secretary across the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty ... pretty ... p ... p ... Suddenly he lunges at her, sliding across the table. As the DOCTOR struggles with the terrified girl, the camera pans up to the ceiling, where the metal tube from the spaceship drills through.  Descending upon them, it sucks them up instantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaarrgghh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eeeeeek!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, nice job.  How am I supposed to fix this guy?  He's fucked. ZEKE and EDSEL, two alien space-pilots, are standing nearby, at the control console.  They look like big furry orange heads on stilts, with arms coming out of the sider.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess we turned it up a little too high.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're sorry?  What about me ? I've gotta put this asshole back together. Suddenly the pretty secretary comes through the tube and lands in the jar.  She's a little mussed up, but okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gasp)  Where am I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, who's the chick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well look at my clothes! Who's gonna pay for the dry cleaning?  And where am I? I demand that you return me to my office immediately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too late - molecular instability zone around spacecraft. You cannot leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?!  Is he kidding?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh ... He looks at the ROBOT, who winks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... oh yeah.  Instability zone. You're stuck here. ZEKE and EDSEL try to keep straight faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I have to be at my parents for dinner tonight.  And my gynecologist appointment is on Wednesday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not anymore.  Would you, ah, like a drink? (leading her away) You'll feel better after a glass of fresh blo-aak. They disappear down a corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have any diet soda?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, typical robot.  The first Earth-chick we see in ten years, and he's gotta make a play for her. EDSEL jams the gearshift into 'D' for Drive, and the ship lifts away from Earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, do we have any of that Plutonian Nyborg left?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, yeah.  Just one bag.  Uh, it's in the transmitter compartment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, thanks man. ZEKE opens a hatch and pulls out a double-spouted plastic bag on wheels the size of a steamer-trunk.  It is full of white powder. He pours two fifteen-foot lines of powder onto the floor. Then, he pauses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh great.  Think this is enough?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uhh ... nah.  Go for broke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good thinking, man. As he resumes pouring, ZEKE begins singing to himself in an alien tongue.  When the lines are poured, they both stand at the start of the trail of white powder, and part their hair to reveal nostrils hidden in their foreheads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nose dive! They both start to criss-cross the room, inhaling the white powder like vaccuum cleaners.  As they happily snort the Nyborg, the camera pans back to the glass receiving jar, and moves down through the broken pieces of DOCTOR ANRAK.  Reaching his lifeless face, the camera moves around to the back of the head.  Through the shattered metal we can see a green ball, glowing inside ANRAK'S skullpiece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, wow ... good Nyborg!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was incredible.  I've never felt anything like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh great.  I have been programmed to be fully proficient in sexual activities. Do you want to go steady?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gee, I don't know.  I already have a boyfriend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, what he does not know will not hurt him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mothership calling starcruiser Alpha ... Mothership calling starcruiser Alpha ... ZEKE looks over at the screen and then shouts into it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whaddyawant, man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mothership calling Starcruiser Alpha ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You gotta use the microphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah. (shouts into microphone) Whaddyawant man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now listen, idiot.  Do I have to tell you eight hundred times?  You don't call me " man "!  You call me
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The flare shoots down the fuselage and smashes into him. Wreathed in flames, he falls back into the fuselage.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Creatures swarm all over the plane.  The ball turret falls off.  A wheel suddenly lowers, then falls off.  A flap flutters free and blows away.  Oil streams back into the slipstream and sections of the skin of the plane come away, revealing the skeleton framework of the fuselage.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He is fighting the controls.  Creatures are now in the cockpit, plucking out the instruments.  The PILOT reaches to the throttle only to grab a creature that locks on to his gloved hand. Flying the plane with his good hand, he strikes and pummels at the attacking creatures with the other.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It is now almost a flying skeleton.  For the first time, we see that it is heading for an island.  A figure detaches itself from the machine and plummets away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He falls, terror-stricken, through space.  Finally his chute opens.  A slimy creature still clings to his gloved hand.  He rips off the glove and throws it and the creature away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The approaching smoking plane bellies onto the sea, bounces, then skims along the wave tops, careening up onto the beach, where it twists around crazily before coming to a lopsided stop.  The machine faces us head-on and we see a glow coming from what's left of No. 3 engine. The camera zooms in rapidly to a green ball stuck in engine No. 3.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He has landed, and is undoing his parachute harness.  He looks around incredulously.  The island is a junkyard - a veritable graveyard of aircrafts.  There are many aircrafts, both old wrecks and futuristic-looking ones lying everywhere.  Skeletal corpses are still left in some of the wrecks.  The camera pans to the remains of one machine.  It is an old American Lockheed Electra.  It glints dull in the half light of dawn.  Painted on its side are two names; "Amelia Earhart" and "Fred Noonan". The camera continues to move through this panorama of metallic junk until it stops on a long chrome rod sticking up out of a pile of scrap. Tilting up to the sky we see the clouds part as two gargantuan metal arms emerge and descend down toward the junkpile.  The metal arms reach the chrome rod, grip it tightly, and begin to lift it up. WWe follow as the cylinder is pulled higher and higher, finally coming to a stop in front of a giant eyeball.  The camera pulls back to reveal that the eyeball belongs to AUSTIN GRIMALDI, who carefully scrutinizes the orange diode held tightly in his needlenose pliers.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The Council's voices still ringing in her head, TAARNA flies in over the demolished gates.  Below her, the once-beautiful city lies in ruins. Gliding overtop the deserted streets, she sees a column of smoke rising through the wrecked dome of the building in the town's center.  As she watches the smoke rise, she pulls hard on the reins, and heads her bird up. The camera follows as she rides in through the shattered dome down to the Council Chambers below. Corpses of the Councilmen are strewn everywhere.  In the center of the room, a large pile of ancient books and manuscripts lie smouldering.  Reaching the floor, TAARNA dismounts and starts to look around.  At the head of the marble table sits the ELDER - dead.  In front of him, a roll of parchment lies on the table.  TAARNA opens it. Carefully painted on the parchment is a circle of mountains, their tops glowing green. TAARNA looks at it, and puts it in her sack.  Then she notices that the ELDER is clutching something in his hand.  Prying his stiff fingers apart, she finds a blood-stained medallion just like the one her attacker wore on his chain. Looking at the dead ELDER, TAARNA grips the medallion tightly in her hand.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: CUT TO THE GATES OF KRAAN

dialogue.raw_text: flies back out through the shattered dome and surveys the city below.  All is quiet and dark, except for a green glow coming from a second-floor window.  Curious, she flies over, pulls up beside the window, and climbs in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: CUT TO OUTSIDE THE COUNCIL BUILDING TAARNA

dialogue.raw_text: Entering, TAARNA sees the slimy silk-like cocoon on the bed. The basket of fruit still sits on the floor.  From within the webbing, the green ball is glowing brightly. TAARNA looks at the parchment in her sack, then at the glow coming from the cocoon.  Cautiously, she approaches the cocoon, sword drawn. Suddenly a hand from within the cocoon grabs the ball and shoots forward, ripping through the webbing and holding the ball up to TAARNA's face.  The hand belongs to a hideously ugly witch, who emerges from the cocoon, cackling through snake-like fangs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The WITCH'S green ball zooms through space, as Earth appears in the distance.  Then another object comes into sight.  Getting closer we see that is is a modern winged rocketplane of no determinable nationality, soaring high above Earth.  The green meteorite passes, briefly bathing the rocketplane in its glow. The rocketplane banks sharply, then stabilizes.  Slowly the hatch-doors in its belly open up, revealing the underside of an automobile suspended in the open hatch. Hydraulic metal arms emerge, lowering the automobile out from the belly of the cruising rocketplane.  We can see now that the car is a white, '59 Corvette convertible. With a "thunk", the metal arms release the car, and as the rocketplane blasts away, the Corvette begins its free-fall to Earth. As the car falls gracefully through space, the driver plays with the wheel, causing the Corvette to bank smoothly one way, then the other. Once his direction is stable, the driver clicks on the car radio and adjusts it through various channels, until he settles on one. With the music playing, the car falls closer and closer to Earth, entering and emerging from the cloud cover over the atmosphere.  In the heat of entry the vehicle's paint starts burning up. As he heads down over a deserted area, the driver begins his approach.  Touching down at breakneck speed, the smoking Corvette bounces violently, every part straining at the repeated impact. The driver's face is expressionless as he jams the car into high gear and floors it, spinning the wheels in an attempt to translate downward momentum into forward motion.  Then he pops his drag chute to help slow down. TThis accomplished, the expressionless driver releases the chute, and speeds off down the road in a cloud of dust.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .  THE PENTAGON - AERIAL SHOT From high above the building we see a crowd of reporters and T.V. newsmen waiting on the front steps. The '59 Corvette pulls up at the curb below, and seeing it, the reporters all start to run over. The camera zooms down and into the car.  Inside, the driver reaches over, unplugs a rubber hose, and loosens the two large hex-nuts which connect him to the car.  As he gets out, the reporters come running up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .  PENTAGON - MEETING ROOM Around a large table sit the Joint Chiefs of Staff, members of the Cabinet, and a pretty secretary wearing a tight skirt. An argument is in progress as the expressionless DOCTOR ANRAK enters.  The camera follows him as he sits down next to one of the Generals.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: An enormous round spaceship the size of Pittsburg hovers overhead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: CUT BACK TO THE MEETING ROOM DOCTOR

dialogue.raw_text: From the bottom of the huge spacecraft, a metal tube emerges and starts to drill through the roof of the Pentagon.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The DOCTOR starts to shake violently as he stares at the pretty secretary.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: CUT BACK TO THE MEETING ROOM

dialogue.raw_text: - CONTROL ROOM A metallic robot holding a clipboard, is standing in front of a large glass receiving jar, as DOCTOR ANRAK comes through the tube and lands in the jar.  As soon as the DOCTOR'S feet hit the bottom of the jar, the DOCTOR breaks into a lot of small metallic parts.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: - ZEKE AND EDSEL'S P.O.V. As the round spaceship moves through space, a group of asteroids approach and whip past.  Up ahead, a red sun turns white and goes super-nova.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: - ROBOT'S BEDROOM GLORIA PEARLMAN and the ROBOT are lying in bed, naked. They have just finished making love.  She is smoking a cigarette.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: and EDSEL are sitting at the controls, staring wide-eyed out into space.  They are obviously stoned.  Suddenly a bell rings and the communicator screen lights up.  A serious officer's face appears on it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Com-Op Officer Blix ". Now is that perfectly clear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure.  Whaddyawant, man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are to return immediately to the Mother Ship and pick up a humanoid civilian.  Your orders are to escort him to the Interplanetary Tribunal Courtroom so that he can testify at the trial of Lincoln Sternn.  And make it snappy! The screen goes blank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow!  They finally got Sternn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's about time.  Hang on, man. Here we go. ZEKE jams the gearshift into hyper-drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay to land this thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're goin' a little high, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay, man.  If there's one thing I know, it's how to drive when I'm stoned.  It's like, you know your perspective's fucked, so you just gotta let your hands work the controls as if you're straight. The round ship rams directly into a wall, and crashes down, skidding to a stop in front of the loading bay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, wow, good landing, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This man is to be delivered to the, clik, Interplanetary Tribunal, Courtroom #3, clik, Galaxy versus Lincoln Sternn. Thenk yew.  Clik. The guards wheel away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Umm, you're gonna testify at Sternn's trial? FISTE nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They gotta give him at least, like, life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lincoln Sternn is a kind and honourable man. (camera pulls close to Fiste's face) He will be freed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Y'know, I wish they'd clean this place up, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.  It's like pig city out here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... but I don't understand.  We laugh together.  We care for each other.  We have highly proficient sex.  Why can't we get married?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, we're different, okay?  Let's leave it at that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... but mixed marriages just don't work.  What if you get tired of me and run off with a vibrator or something? As they move through the room, and out the other side, they pass FISTE, who is sitting quietly near the receiving jar, hands folded.  Looking around, FISTE notices a green glow coming from the bottom of the jar.  He gets up, quietly opens the jar, and pokes through the scrap robot parts. Finding the small green ball in ANRAK'S head, he pulls it out and looks at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There it is, man.  I'm gonna hang a louie here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well it won't be long now.  Are you sure you're gonna testify for Sternn. FISTE says nothing.  He just clutches the green ball and stares into space. ZEKE and EDSEL look at each other and shrug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... alright, alright.  I'll marry you - but on one condition ... I want a Jewish wedding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jewish wedding!?!!!  But this is space .  95% of the population are robots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, find me a robot -rabbi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I give them six months, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't even look Jewish! GLORIA and the ROBOT disappear around a corner as ZEKE and EDSEL escort FISTE through the hatch.  FISTE is carrying the small green ball. As they lead FISTE away, the camera pulls back, out through a space-port, and moves along the outside of the slowly rotating space-station.  At the top, the camera zooms down through a massive glass-domed ceiling and into a huge inter-galactic courtroom. Voices echo below us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you Captain Lincoln F. Sternn?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am. As we move down, we see square-jawed CAPTAIN STERNN, his shifty-eyed lawyer, and the cold Prosecutor all standing before the Judge. STERNN is smirking confidently as the Prosecutor reads from a long page of charges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lincoln Sternn - you stand here accused of twelve counts of murder in the first degree  ... fourteen counts of armed theft of Federation property ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... twenty-two counts of piracy in high space ... eighteen counts of fraud ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... thirty-seven counts of rape, and one moving violation.  How do you plead?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not guilty!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not guilty?!?  Are you nuts ?!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay, Charlie.  I got an angle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call the first witness! STERNN and his lawyer move to their seats.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the Prosecutor's gotcha cold ! Yer as guilty as a cat in a goldfish bowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Prosecution calls Hanover Fiste.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calling Hanover Fiste!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calling Hanover Fiste!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calling Hanover Fiste!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hanover Fiste! ZEKE and EDSEL sit down, while HANOVER FISTE, small and shabby, walks up to the witness stand, nervously clutching the small green ball in his hand.  As he passes, STERNN and his lawyer continue to argue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lissen Sternn ... change the plea to guilty.  Throw yerself on the mercy of the court.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you, Charlie.  I got an angle. HANOVER FISTE is sworn in, as Sternn's lawyer begs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the most we can hope for is to get ya buried in secrecy so yer grave don't get violated!  Plead guilty !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut up, Charlie.  I got an angle .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: State your name for the record.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Hanover Fiste.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I promised him thirty-five thousand zuleks to testify on my behalf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know the defendant, (pointing) Captain Sternn?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I know Captain Sternn.  And never did there live a kinder, more generous man.  He is an overflowing cup, filled with the very cream of human goodness ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... in all the time I've known him, he's never done anything immoral ... (thinking) unless maybe the Pre-Schooler's Prostitute ring ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... and he's ah, never done anything illegal ... (turning sharply) ... unless you count all the times he sold dope disguised as a nun !! (reverting to meekness) He's always been a good, law-abiding citizen ... (shouting at himself) Awww, gimme a break!! (gentle again) ... of the Federation, and, and ... (going schizo) Shut Up!  Shut Up!  Shut Up! (gentle, but starting to sweat) ... a community-concious individual, ah, ah ... (rising in crazed anger)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The round spaceship blasts forward at ten times the speed of light.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: - LATER ZEKE and EDSEL'S round spacecraft looks like an apple heading toward a freight train as it approaches the enormous mother-ship.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: - CONTROL CONSOLE An ashtray full of roaches sits on the console.  ZEKE is at the controls with a joint in his mouth.  He is swaying back and forth, eyes glazed.  Beside him, EDSEL watches the mothership getting closer.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Huge red arrows point the way through the ten-mile wide landing area as the round spaceship glides in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: - ENTRANCE HATCH ZEKE and EDSEL press a button to open the hatch doors. As the door opens we see two metallic Regolian guards waiting on the other side.  Between them stands a small, shabbily-dressed humanoid with a crooked jaw and cauliflower ears.  This is HANOVER FISTE.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: and EDSEL escort FISTE down the corridor.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: CUT TO CORRIDOR IN SPACESHIP ZEKE

dialogue.raw_text: As the round spaceship journeys through space it passes through a fantastic space-scape of disembodied rock statues, and past a magnificent graffiti-covered robot chained to an asteroid.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: is getting dressed as the ROBOT re-charges his energy- paks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The hatch opens, and GLORIA and the ROBOT walk through, still talking.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: and EDSEL are sitting at the controls, driving carefully. FISTE, carrying the green ball, comes up and sits down beside them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: An enormous, brightly-lit, multi-level space station/courthouse floats into view, completely filling the screen.  ZEKE and EDSEL'S round spaceship is just a speck as it enters the frame, approaching the mammoth structure.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The ship locks into the dock, and the exit hatch opens. GLORIA and the ROBOT come through first, ahead of ZEKE, EDSEL, and FISTE.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The hostile humanoid and alien faces all stare at STERNN with hateful, accusing eyes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Mopping his brow, he looks nervously over to STERNN.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Smiling to himself, he nods, then gets serious.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: and EDSEL enter with FISTE, and push their way to the front.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: CUT TO THE COURTROOM DOORS ZEKE
CUT BACK TO WITNESS STAND PROSECUTOR
CUT TO STERNN AND HIS LAWYER STERNN
CUT BACK TO WITNESS STAND FISTE

dialogue.raw_text: They look at each other, shocked.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: CUT TO STERNN AND HIS LAWYER
CUT BACK TO WITNESS STAND FISTE

direction.raw_text: !!! (pointing as he screams) He's nothin' but a low-down, double-dealin', back-stabbin', larcenous, perverted worm !! STERNN and his lawyer look on, horrified, as FISTE'S body starts to grow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hangin's too good for him!! New muscles tear through FISTE'S shabby clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Burnin's too good for him!! Growing larger, he starts foaming at the mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hanover ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He should be torn into little bitsy pieces and buried alive !!! FISTE rams his hands down onto the Witness Stand, shattering it completely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hanover ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll kill him! He hurls the Prosecutor aside, and moves towards STERNN with thundering footsteps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - ILLL!!! Still growing, he rips apart the Judge's bench as he passes it.  Finally  he stands towering in rage over the terrified STERNN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: H-h-hey, Hanover ... n-now take it easy, Hanover, I'm sure we can talk this ov ... Instinctively, STERNN leaps back as FISTE'S giant hands come smashing down in the spot where STERNN stood.  The gallery scatters screaming as STERNN runs for the door.  Slavering, FISTE thunders after him.  STERNN runs through the exit, bolting the door behind him.  FISTE follows, tearing the door apart, and bringing the entire courtroom wall down in the process.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Halt, clik, in the name of the Federation, clik.  Where is your corridor pass? (to other Regolians) Unco-operative humanoid, clik, blast him. They open fire, but FISTE is unstoppable.  Still growing, he grabs the Regolians's weapons, crunches them up and eats them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are now in violation of Code
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Running down a hallway, STERNN passes a group of Regolian cops, who raise their weapons in an attempt to block the rampaging FISTE.
dialogue.name: dialogue
